data.Name: MARAUDA
data.Bio: MARAUDA (formerly Elephant Man, Mastodon, MASTADON and later MASTA-DON) is a 19 year old dubstep and bass music producer based in Sydney, Australia. He has released music on Never Say Die Records, Disciple Records, Bassrush Records, Slugz Music, Busted Records and also releases on his own label Malignant Music. A visit to the social media pages of Mastadon reveals that the Australian dubstep producer has made a significant change to his brand. For the foreseeable future, the artist named Hamish Prasad will go by the stage name Marauda. Read more on Last.fm
